posts.post_content: may have one. condition isn't past a 1 or 1.5 but can provide pictures if interested. piedmont 150 back
Thx but looking for a 4 min.

posts.post_title: there is one on ebay right now.
posts.post_content: there is one on ebay right now.

[quote name="thehoodedcoder" post=1098993]there is one on ebay right now.[/QUOTE]

There are A LOT on Ebay right now. At least 5 around your grade range that I've seen.  Some have been sitting on Ebay collecting dust for months on end due to the WAY over inflated price tags on them.  Nobody is obviously interested in dropping $3,000+ for a 3 or 4 grade, not to mention the card (along with most T206s) are a dime a dozen.  You shouldn't have very much trouble snagging one for a decent (non ebay) price.

Glenn, I have found it virtually impossible to get a good price from a BIN seller.  Most are content just to let the cards sit there until a price-inelastic buyer comes along.  I am willing to pay strong but not crazy.  I would have thought it would not be hard to find one as they are plentiful, but one has eluded me so far...
